name: d3-scale
description: Encodings that map abstract data to visual representation.

scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-array:d3_array,d3-color:d3_color,d3-format:d3_format,d3-interpolate:d3_interpolate,d3-time:d3_time,d3-time-format:d3_time_format -u d3-scale -n d3_scale -o build/d3-scale.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-scale.js -c -m -o build/d3-scale.min.js && rm -f build/d3-scale.zip && zip -j build/d3-scale.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-scale.js build/d3-scale.min.js
